intro.description:
In addition to plotting your recorded vehicle data, Debrief is able to show a number of datasets in backdrop form.
These range from Vectored datasets such as VPF through to gridded datasets such as ETOPO-2

item.title: How to configure VPF library datasets
item.description: The steps to configure VPF and Etopo are covered in Debrief's user manual. NoPrintIf you wish to learn this at this stage, use the 'Question Mark' help link alongside, else search for VPF in Debrief's online help at some future stage.NoPrint Here's a clue though, you go into the Maritime Analysis section of the Preferences.

item.title: How to configure ETOPO library data
item.description: NoPrint Use the help link to the side of this text to open the guidance on how to configure the location of the ETOPO data. NoPrint Please read the relevant section of the Debrief User Guide for how to specify use the Debrief/Preferences dialog the location of the ETOPO dataset.
